index.title: Components
index.description: Our reusable components offer an easy-to-use and accessible solution for forms, navigation, tables and more.

navigation.title: Navigation
navigation.description: Use navigation to visualise the structure of your content and to direct users to the right place.

search.title: Search field
search.description: Use the search component if you need users to be able to search the content of a digital product or service.

tables.title: Tables
tables.description: Use tables to make certain information easier for users to scan and compare.

cards.title: Cards
cards.description: Use cards to break up content on a page, or to group related content together.

expansion.title: Expansion panels
expansion.description: Use expansion panels when space is limited and the hidden content isn't essential information.

buttons.title: Buttons
buttons.description: Use buttons to help users complete a task or to carry out an action.

forms.title: Form elements
forms.description: Use form elements to capture information from the user and to add consistency between products.

dialogs.title: Dialogue boxes
dialogs.description: Use dialogue boxes to highlight specific, often important, information to the user.

errors.title: Errors
errors.description: Use error messages to tell a user that there's a problem with the information they have entered.
